title: Jacob Rees-Mogg – 2023 Comments Calling Commons Committee “Marsupials”
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Jacob Rees-Mogg, the Conservative MP for North East Somerset, on Twitter on 22 March 2023 during the Commons committee investigating whether Boris Johnson had deliberately lied to Parliament.
content:
Boris is doing very well against the marsupials.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
